content.description:
This boulder is one of the only worthwhile boulders east of the staircase. It sits perched on top of a few other boulders and is easily identified by the black striations that leave crazy patterns throughout the rock. A few problems can be found on this block, though unlike the other East Marion boulders, the landings here are a bit more precarious.  

  NOTE: Be mindful that this boulder has had 'No Trespassing' spray painted on its side at various times, though, technically, I believe it is not on private property.
